message.content:
1. Dexamethasone and diclofenac K were co-administered.
2. The combination of dexamethasone and diclofenac K was compared to diclofenac alone.
3. The combination of dexamethasone and diclofenac K was found to be superior to diclofenac alone.
4. The superiority of the combination was in relation to the relief of pain.
5. The superiority of the combination was statistically significant (P < 0.05).
6. The combination of dexamethasone and diclofenac K also reduced facial swelling.
7. The reduction in facial swelling was observed up to post-operative 48 hours.
8. The reduction in facial swelling was statistically significant (P < 0.05).

messages.content:
Statement: Co-administration of dexamethasone and diclofenac K was significantly superior to diclofenac alone for the relief of pain (P < 0.05), and facial swelling up to post-operative 48 hour (P < 0.05).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
